This paper presents a wireless patient monitoring system. It uses a Wireless ECG signal transmitter, GPS device, and mobile phone to collect health information. This data is sent to a local server using Bluetooth. 

The system has four types of monitor units: a control center, a local monitor unit, mobile devices (like PDAs), and a web page for patients and doctors. These units are designed to meet different needs of medical staff.

The application aims to give patients and doctors more freedom and flexibility. This will enhance healthcare quality and improve the patient's lifestyle.
